rules_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a permanent you don’t control, corrupt that permanent. [i](Untap it and gain control of it until end of turn. Until end of turn, it gains haste, can’t be sacrificed, and you may spend mana as though it were any type to activate its abilities.)[/i]
notes:
Inspiration — Twilight Zone — The Monsters are Due on Maple Street

Mechanical Uniqueness — Corrupt keyword

Assistance — Targeting permanents cheaply
